data.title: Implement fool-proof knowledge transfer solution
data.description: The knowledge transfer memory file 2025-12-22-session-knowledge-transfer-got-migration.md was referenced but does not exist. Need to implement a reliable solution that ensures knowledge transfer files are created consistently and with predictable naming conventions. Consider: 1) Validation that referenced files exist, 2) Standardized naming convention, 3) Auto-generation from session data, 4) Link validation in CLAUDE.md
